Version 1.1.0 Hacker News feature requests and bugfixes

These are some very quickly added changes resulting from this morning’s exposure on Hacker News. A few real show-stopping bugs have been fixed, and a new feature has been added for mutt users.

Many thanks to @storge on GitHub for all the help fixing the long series of issues in Issue #1. You absolute legend.

Also, thanks to 7h0ma5 on HN for the mutt integration suggestion and the helpful documentation link. Support for usage as the backend to mutt’s query_command option has been added in the form of ppl mutt.

  • Fixed missing dependency declaration in gemspec
  • Fixed missing minimum ruby version in gemspec
  • Fixed completely broken and useless ppl init command
  • Added ppl mutt command
